title: WHAT QUICK HITCH DO YOU NEED? CAT 1 VS CAT 2 QUICK HITCHES

tasks.task: Compare category one and category two quick hitches for tractors.
subtasks: Determine tractor category (e.g., subcompact, compact, utility).
Identify the need for bushings based on quick hitch category.
Measure dimensions of quick hitches (e.g., inner-to-inner spacing, top link height).
Understand compatibility between tractor and quick hitch attachments.
Aware of shipping considerations for category two quick hitches.

tasks.task: Compare category one and category two quick hitches for tractors.**
subtasks: Determine the tractor's category (e.g., subcompact, compact, utility) to know compatibility.**
Identify whether bushings are required based on the tractor's category.**

Measure dimensions such as inner-to-inner spacing (5 inches difference), top link height (15 inches on category two, welded in place), and ID size (17/16 inches on category one compared to 15/16 inches on category two).**
Understand compatibility between tractors and quick hitch attachments (category one vs. two).**
Be aware of shipping considerations for category two quick hitches (weight, 134 pounds, requiring pallet shipping or commercial addresses for cost savings).**
